snippet: After setting a record in the first quarter of 2012, the New York police cut back on the number of warrantless stops they made from April 1 to June 30.
lead_paragraph: After setting a record in the first quarter of 2012, the New York police cut back on the number of warrantless stops they made from April 1 to June 30.

headline.seo: Stop-and-Frisk Episodes Drop After Setting Record
